attributes.additional_details: Madbid.com falsely advertises by conning users into thinking they can win an item for just £10.  Firstly to bid the user has to buy tokens and spend around £50 - £100 on the item to win the bid.  Most users lose a lot of money and leave empty handed, this site should be registered as a gambling site and not an auction.  Madbid earn around 300% of the price the item would have cost to buy, an example is tokens cost on average 10p to bid for iPhone 4 16 GB prices at £499 its 6 tokens a bid there were 5,142 bids and they giving them £3,702 for an item worth ony £499.  Make a stand stop people being conned into losing money.
